ch0068_01_leader2/0101_0701_02_10:
You could go out and have fun—or even have
a battle or two! Whatever you do, I hope you
enjoy it!
ch0068_01_leader2/7101_0701_01_10:
I head the committee that runs the PML.
We’re also in charge of ensuring the safety
and security of Pasio.
ch0068_01_leader2/7101_0701_02_10:
My staff works up a sweat every day patrolling
the island to keep everyone safe!
ch0068_01_leader2/7101_0701_03_10:
If you ever see ’em, I’m sure a few words of
encouragement would make their day.
ch0068_01_leader2/7102_0701_01_10:
There aren’t any wild Pokémon on Pasio. That’s
something we considered as part of its concept.
ch0068_01_leader2/7102_0701_02_10:
But Hoopa just keeps bringing more and more
Pokémon here without any warning...
ch0068_01_leader2/7102_0701_03_10:
I wish it would think a little more about how that
affects our work... We’re always having to fix
things afterward.
ch0068_01_leader2/7103_0701_01_10:
The other day, I proposed a new event to liven
things up on Pasio!
ch0068_01_leader2/7103_0701_02_10:
It was a Muscle Fest, where sync pairs with
magnificent muscles can battle to decide
who’s the strongest.
ch0068_01_leader2/7103_0701_03_10:
But the young master immediately dismissed
the idea...
ch0068_01_leader2/7103_0701_04_10: I wonder if he hates muscles...
ch0068_01_leader2/7104_0701_01_10:
Rachel’s personality is the opposite of mine...
She’s great at speaking her mind.
ch0068_01_leader2/7104_0701_02_10:
That’s why our ideas clash sometimes. But when
it comes to putting the young master first, we’re
always on the same page.
ch0068_01_leader2/7104_0701_03_10:
She’s the best coworker I could ask for. Be nice to
her, all right?
ch0068_01_leader2/7105_0701_01_10:
He may not say it out loud, but the young master
thinks highly of you.
ch0068_01_leader2/7105_0701_02_10:
I also feel the same way. Please keep battling
the young master so you can both grow together!
ch0068_01_leader2/1701_0702_01_10:
I hope it helps you out somehow. Consider it a
token of appreciation for helping us promote
our events!
ch0068_01_leader2/2501_0701_01_10:
One of my duties is to protect the young
master as his bodyguard.
ch0068_01_leader2/2501_0701_02_10:
That’s why I never slack off on my workouts. 
Sometimes, I even wrestle with Bewear!
ch0068_01_leader2/2501_0701_03_10:
No matter what kind of riffraff comes to this
island, I’ll protect the young master with my body
of steel!
ch0068_01_leader2/2501_0702_01_10:
If you ever feel like you’d like to start bulking up,
just let me know.
ch0068_01_leader2/2501_0702_02_10:
I can put together a regimen for you that’ll get
you ripped.
ch0068_01_leader2/2501_0702_03_10:
You’re always helping us with our events here on
Pasio, so consider it a thank-you for doing that.
Just say the word!
ch0068_01_leader2/2511_0701_01_10:
I was assigned to watch over the young master
soon after he was born. I’ve watched him grow
ever since.
ch0068_01_leader2/2511_0701_02_10:
Maybe because of that, I can be soft on him
sometimes. Though really, I’m supposed to step in
when he goes too far!
ch0068_01_leader2/2511_0701_03_10:
I know that I need to be tougher sometimes, but
habits are hard to break.
ch0068_01_leader2/2511_0702_01_10:
One day, the young master will take over as king
and guide our kingdom in the right direction.
ch0068_01_leader2/2511_0702_02_10: Just thinking about it makes me... *sniff*
ch0068_01_leader2/3001_0701_01_10:
It’s the start of a new morning. Time to patrol the
island to make sure nobody disturbs the peace!
ch0068_01_leader2/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m always looking for new ways to make things
exciting on Pasio. Got any ideas?
ch0068_01_leader2/3005_0701_01_10:
Haha, what a day, huh? If you’re feeling tired,
don’t worry. Days like this only make you stronger!
